actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against tax for amounts paid by an individual as elementary or secondary school tuition for the education of his dependent children.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited credit against an individual's income tax for the tuition paid by such individual to one or more eligible elementary or secondary education institutions for any of his dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against tax for amounts paid by an individual as elementary or secondary school tuition for the education of his dependent children.
